Title: NITDA, API move against harmful online content
Summary: The National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA) convened a one-day workshop in Abuja to advance dialogue on the draft Online Harm Protection (OHP) Bill to confront harmful online content .

Title: ‘Weak policies, data gaps are barriers to boardroom diversity’
Summary: Entrenched social norms, patriarchy, weak policy implementation and enforcement, data gaps and lack of accountability are adversely affecting boardroom diversity . Weak policies and data gaps are barriers to diversity, according to the report .

Title: LASG plans N500 billion  ‘produce for Lagos’  initiative to aid food security
Summary: Lagos State Government has concluded its plan to unveil a N500 billion 'Produce for Lagos' initiative . The initiative is a landmark offtaker programme to boost food security .

Title: HURIWA laments security agencies’ failure to arrest, neutralise terrorists
Summary: HURIWA laments security agencies’ failure to arrest, neutralise terrorists . Governor Caleb Mutfwang of Plateau State spoke against the military’s inability to arrest or neutralise the terrorists that killed 27 farmers in Riyom last week .

Title: Muhammadu Buhari’s passage
Summary: The death of General Muhammadu Buhari is neither an occasion to demonise nor to canonise him . Nigeria is bigger than her leaders, says Fem Fem Femi Oladeji .

Title: ADC coalition won’t survive - Ortom
Summary: Samuel Ortom dismissed the chances of success for the coalition-backed African Democratic Congress (ADC) The former Governor of Benue State said the coalition won't survive . Ortom is a chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP)

Title: Lagos Govt intensifies efforts to tackle flash flooding
Summary: Lagos Govt reiterates commitment to upgrading and building resilient drainage infrastructure . The Lagos State Government has stated that flash flooding will continue to occur in the state .

Title: Defection rumour: I’m not leaving PDP — Gov Adeleke
Summary: Osun State Governor Ademola Adeleke dismisses rumours of defection . Adelek says he is going nowhere and remains in the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP .

Title: Why Atiku hasn’t officially joined ADC — Source
Summary: His Excellency Alhaji Atiku Abubakar needs to physically see him picking up his membership card and completing the formalities . Once he returns from his break, that’s one of the first major things he is expected to do,” a source said .

Title: Nigeria’s economy grows by 3.13% in Q1’25
Summary: The National Bureau of Statistics, NBS, yesterday said that the nation’s economy grew by 3.13 per cent in the first quarter of 2025 .
